index.infoSection:
### By students, for students. Free & Open Source.
TUfast is the #1 productivity tool for students at TU Dresden.
For two years, we have been creating the perfect product to make your everyday study life easier.

Find out more about the project on this site and install TUfast now!

content: ## Project
TUfast has come alive in May 2020 and has more than 2500 users as of 01.01.2022.
### üöÄ What does TUfast do?
With TUfast you can **save up to 2000 Clicks and 90 minutes** per semester!
To do this, TUfast provides a number of features to make your everyday studies easier, such as:

- AutoLogin to all online platforms
 - Quick-access and hotkeys for many platforms
 - Supports SELMA, OPAL, jExam and many more
 - Overview of all your OPAL-courses as well as improvements for OPAL itself.
 - ... and many more that you can discover in TUfast ;)
### üîê Is TUfast secure?

The TUfast extension stores user data only locally on your device. If you uninstall the extension, all data will be deleted as well. Additionally, TUfast is currently being audited by the department of IT security of TU Dresden. Here you can find our [privacy policy](/datenschutz).
### üîÆ Whats next?
We want to make TUfast available for 5000+ students at TU Dresden and for at least one more university in Saxony by end of this year.
In addition, we are currently looking for funding and incubators.
### ‚ù§Ô∏è Supporters
The project is being supported by:

- Ms. Jantos, the eLearning coordinator of TU Dresden
 - The [DigitalAcceleratorProgramm](https://www.stifterverband.org/digitalchangemaker-accelerator) of the Stifterverband
 - Kind sponsors on [BuyMeACoffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/olihausdoerfer)
- Several student councils

active.name: Daniel Kluge
active.studies: Dipl.-Ing. Information Systems Engineering, TU Dresden

content: ## Jobs
**The best thing about TUfast?** Develop software for a real use case with 2500 users and provide benefits for your fellow students!

**You are interested**? Write us an e-mail at [frage@tu-fast.de](mailto:frage@tu-fast.de) that answers the following questions: 1. What will be your top three principles in software development for TUfast? 2. Which part of the project would you like to contribute to? We will answer your mail within 5 days.
After one year of membership, you can receive a certificate for your contributions and involvement in the project.
### Do I need to be able to write software to participate?
If you want to develop software, previous experience with git and web technologies is useful. However, our tech stack is not complicated.

If you cannot code but are really interested in the project, you are still welcome to participate. We have many tasks that would be suitable to get into web development. Beyond that, we are also looking for students interested in project management, product communication and marketing.
### Open positions

listings.title: TUfast for Safari
listings.content:
We get many requests that TUfast should also support Safari. You have experience with developing for macOS/Safari? Then do your fellow students a favor and take over the implementation! 

 Learnings: Distribution of web extensions, web development, macOS/Safari

listings.title: TUfast for mobile
listings.content:
Service-Workers are the latest trend in web technologies - that's why we want to switch to them as well. This will enable us to make TUfast available for mobile devices and to add many new features. 

 Learnings: Mobile optimization, service workers

listings.title: TUfast for HTW (and other Universities)
listings.content:
TUfast is great - students at the HTW have also noticed that. Therefore, we would like to make TUfast available for HTW as well by the end of the year. This includes: Designing a software concept to integrate more universities and implementing it for HTW. 

 Learning: Software design, web development, user oriented services

listings.title: IT Security
listings.content:
We are looking for someone who looks into the security aspects of TUfast. We already got feedback and a scrutiny from the Informationssicherheit TU Dresden. In the future, we would like to evaluate security internally and implement measures accordingly. 

 Learnings: IT security, Websecurity, Webdevelopment

listings.title: TUfast Telemetry
listings.content:
We want to collect anonymous usage data for TUfast to make the service even better. This data should be published on our website as well. Possible tools include Clickhouse or OpenTelemetry. 

 Learnings: Product telemetry, back-end design and implementation

listings.title: Marketing
listings.content:
We value marketing as a huge part of our project. Our goal is, to develop a clear brand communication and distribute TUfast to as many users as possible. You want to gather experience in marketing and brand communication? Then this is the perfect spot for you! 

 Learnings: Design, brand communication, project responsibility

listings.title: Project management
listings.content:
A team is only as good as its shared vision. In project management, you make sure that this vision is communicated and achieved. This includes looking for project sponsors, communication to project stake-holders and general project management. 

 Learnings: Project responsibility, leading, handling stake-holders
